apis.description: Find public domain images for use in courses and user content.  If you select an image using this API, please use the {api:InternetImageController#image_selection Confirm image selection API} to indicate photo usage to the server.

operations.notes: Find public domain images for use in courses and user content.  If you select an image using this API, please use the {api:InternetImageController#image_selection Confirm image selection API} to indicate photo usage to the server.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search terms used for matching images (e.g. "cats").

response_fields.name: id
response_fields.description: The unique identifier for the image.

response_fields.name: alt
response_fields.description: Accessible alternative text for the image.

response_fields.name: user
response_fields.description: The name of the user who owns the image

response_fields.name: user_url
response_fields.description: The URL to view the user's profile on the image upload site

response_fields.name: large_url
response_fields.description: The URL of the image sized large

response_fields.name: small_url
response_fields.description: The URL of the image sized small

response_fields.name: raw_url
response_fields.description: The raw URL of the photo

apis.description: After you have used the search API, you should hit this API to indicate photo usage to the server.

operations.notes: After you have used the search API, you should hit this API to indicate photo usage to the server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID from the image_search result.
